entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem With MAUI and Angular in Visual 22 #15097
  • NavigationPage.ToolbarItems not shown on Android after Back key pressed #15096
  • [iOS] ContentViews and Grids not rendered properly in right-to-left cultures #15095
  • .NET MAUI App template not showing #15094
  • Grid row not sizing correctly with * when the content is a collectionview on iOS #15092
  • Android: InputTransparent adversely affects position or visibility of Labels. #15090
    Backlog
  • Android: text color in buttons in alert dialog and picker dialog for default theme has very low contrast in dark mode #15088
    Backlog
  • WinUI and iOS. InputTransparent does not work. #15087
    Backlog
  • WinUI. Auto-sized Grid row containing ScrollView containing a Rectangle ignores explicit HeightRequest on the Rectangle. #15086
    Backlog
  • Android 7.1, with FlyoutIsPresented = true , can't expand the shell #15081
    Backlog

Closed

  • MAUI uses `Panel` instead of `Grid` for Windows #15093
  • Emoji Issue on Windows #15077
  • Android7.1, 通过 FlyoutIsPresented = true ,无法展开Shell #15082
  • SearchBar is extremely laggy on physical device #9242
  • Inability to target or inspect MAUI elements by content-desc property #14940
  • ScrollView in Grid cell multiple issues on iOS, Android and WinUI. #15076
  • iOS. Auto-sized Grid row containing ScrollView sizes itself to the full height requested by the ScrollView content. #15085
    Backlog
  • CollectionView virtualization does not work when using a DataTemplateSelector #11272
    Backlog
  • why MAUI does not support watch face till now. #15084
  • Webview reloads initial url when app resumes on Android #14939
  • FlexLayout RowReverse doesn't work Properly #7756
  • MAUI Images not loading in VS 2022 17.5 - works in 17.4 (Unpackaged on Windows) #14942
  • Always have to close and restart VS between each new change #14943
  • MinVersion of TargetDeviceFamily not set correctly when TargetPlatformMinVersion is not set in project file #5890
    Backlog
  • [iOS] MinimumHeightRequest and MinimumWidthRequest are not working properly for View #7330
    Backlog
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException #14963
  • .NET MAUI - How to use Tablet running windows OS as debugging device #15080

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.14.2.1 to 4.15.1 #15089
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Adjust flex item position to account for reversal when laying out unconstrained #13936
    area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • Use ReplaceMapping method to replace Window MapTitle method #15041
  • Clear out the renderer on VCR when disconnected #15036
  • Move some controls to use ModifyMapping #15058
  • Move Windows and iOS Frame measure and arrange to xplat layer #14987
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Use AppendToMapping for Focus commands #15040
  • Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #14951
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Change the impl of the event handler to use a notification center to avoid circular refs. #15064
  • Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size #14902
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • Fix up Compatibility gallery #15020
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • Controls(Android): fix frame background color #14917
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
